title: A journalist's Brief But Spectacular take on telling the whole story
description: David Bornstein is co-founder of the Solutions Journalism Network, a group that works with news organizations to produce rigorous reporting on responses to social problems. The goal is to "rebalance the news" to provide people a sense of investment and communities with the information they need to participate in a healthy democracy. Here's his Brief But Spectacular take on telling the whole story. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
